Schnittstelle UserRepository

Alle Superschnittstellen:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,Long>
@Repository public interface UserRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,Long>
Repository for managing User entities.

  • Methodendetails

    • findByUsernameAndPassword

      User findByUsernameAndPassword(String username, String password)
      Finds a User entity by its username and password.
      Parameter:
      username - the username.
      password - the password.
      Gibt zurück:
      the User entity.

    • findByUsernameIgnoreCase

      User findByUsernameIgnoreCase(String username)
      Finds a User entity by its username and ignores Capital letters.
      Parameter:
      username - the username.
      Gibt zurück:
      the User entity.

    • findByEmail

      User findByEmail(String email)
      Finds a User entity by its email.
      Parameter:
      email - the email.
      Gibt zurück:
      the User entity.

    • existsByEmail

      boolean existsByEmail(String email)
      Checks if a User entity exists for a given Email.
      Parameter:
      email - the email.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if a Email entity exists, false otherwise.

    • deleteByUserID

      void deleteByUserID(long userID)
      Deletes a User entity by its ID.
      Parameter:
      userID - the ID of the User.

    • findUserByProfile_ProfileID

      User findUserByProfile_ProfileID(long profileProfileID)
      Finds a User entity by Profil ID.
      Parameter:
      profileProfileID - the ID of the Profil.
      Gibt zurück:
      the User entity.
